name: InterWeb
description:
How to play:

Place satellites between planets to transfer data back and forth, you get payed for the data that is transfered and this money can be used in shops found at planets to buy upgrades, turrets and new satellites. Enemies will come to destroy your satellites so protect them with your life, unless you want to lose your income!
Controls:

Movement: WASD to move and the player looks to where the mouse is.
Vision: Use the scroll wheal to zoom in and out.
Weapon: Left mouse button to shoot and press R to cycle through unlocked weapons.
Shop: Press E when close to a planet to open the shop, use left mouse and drag to scroll in the shop.
Pause: Escape button
Placeables: Drag the placable object from the top of the screen by holding down your mouse and letting it go where you want it to be placed.

Credits:
